data.title: Freemasonry and the Visual Arts from the Eighteenth Century Forward: Historical and Global Perspectives 9781501337963, 9781501337994, 9781501337987
data.meta_description: With the dramatic rise of Freemasonry in the eighteenth century, art played a fundamental role in its practice, rhetoric...
